group.name: Web Site Syndication
group.sample: Demonstrates how to embed one website's functionality into another. Using the WebServiceProxyGenerator remote web app integration is easy.

A more sophisticated example including Amazon and OpenWiki. Shows how a personalized portal can be built by connecting multiple remote services without writing a single line of business logic code. Only styling is used in addition to the proxy.
